casebody.data:
ERIC PLOURDE v. COMMISSIONER OF MOTOR VEHICLES (14524)

O’Connell, Lavery and Landau, Js.

Submitted on briefs February 13 decision released March 5, 1996 Robert J. McKay and Gregory A. Thompson filed a brief for the appellant (plaintiff). Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Robert T. Morrin, assistant attorney general, filed a brief for the appellee (defendant). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
